Info.Description:
Vinh1998's Specops Royal Guard Uniforms This mod changes the uniforms used by the Royal Guard. Wadning: THis mod [b]WILL[/b] clash with any other graphics mod which changes uniforms of the Royal Guard.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Royal Guard mercenaries have black uniforms. [/list]
modded by Dpagio1991. Converted to a3 format by LinkHero95.
